author: Sweta Goswami
text:
BJP’s Dalit face and Northwest Delhi’s MP Udit Raj on Sunday criticised the students agitating over the suicide of scholar Rohith Vemula for being “selective” in their support to the cause of the Dalits. Slamming the Opposition for “faking” solidarity, Mr. Raj alleged that they were trying to gain political mileage out of the issue.

Speaking to The Hindu , he said: “I am against this selective support of the students as well as the Opposition parties. The state of Dalits in Uttar Pradesh is the worst. Officials are being demoted all of a sudden for no reason and forget reservations, students fail to get a seat.”
title: Students selective in support of Dalit cause: Udit Raj
